sentence.Network_en: Do not misspell words or have typos.
sentence.Network_cn: 忌单词拼写错误和排印错误.

sentence.Network_en: However, if they intentionally misspell the name four times, the DEATH NOTE owner will die.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过, 若他是故意写错那人的名字四次, 他就会死亡.

list.abs: change All is not available because the replacement contains the original misspelled word . choose Change to modify only this sentence , or Undo Edit to restore original sentence .无法使用“全部更改”按钮，因为用于替换的内容中含有原误拼单词。您可以选择“更改”按钮(只修改此句)或“撤消编辑”按钮(将句子还原)。
and i am a monkey with a misspelled name !, 我是个拼错名字的猴子!

Found % 1 misspelled words in % 2 pages ., 在 %2 个网页中发现 %1 个拼写错误的单词.

search Marketing's brand names , brand name misspellings or similar variations as keywords or key phrases for the purposes of targeting adverts on PPC search engines .搜索营销的品牌名称，品牌名称拼写错误或相似的变化作为关键词或关键短语为施行对象广告PPC搜索引擎。

entry.def: If someone misspells a word, they spell it wrongly.

example.ex: Sorry I misspelled your last name.
example.tran: 对不起，我把你的姓拼错了。

auth_sentence.content: They misspell every other word and even the brand of their own vehicle.
auth_sentence.res_content: They misspell every other word and even the brand of their own vehicle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They misspell every other word and even the brand of their own vehicle.

mis错误,厌恶,错过+doing做事→n.坏事
mis错误,厌恶,错过+fortune幸运的→n.不幸

mis错误,厌恶,错过+print版,印刷→v.印错 n.印刷错误
mis错误,厌恶,错过+rule统治→统治不善

mis错误,厌恶,错过+understand理解→n.误解
mis错误,厌恶,错过+appropriate拨款→拨款错误→盗用公款
mis错误,厌恶,错过+spell拼写→n.&v.拼法错误
mis错误,厌恶,错过+lead引导→v.误导

sentences.en: He gently chides his students every time they misspelled a word.
sentences.cn: 每当他的学生拼错一个词时，他都温和地责备他们。
